EFS.SG.summary: Effecten-Spiegel AG engages in the investment and publishing businesses in Germany and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Investment for Own Account and Publishing. It holds investments in other companies, as well as publishes stock market journals. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Dusseldorf, Germany.

EFS3.SG.summary: Effecten-Spiegel AG engages in the investment and publishing businesses in Germany and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Investment for Own Account and Publishing. It holds investments in other companies, as well as publishes stock market journals. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Dusseldorf, Germany.

G6P.DE.summary: Going Public Media Aktiengesellschaft operates as a media house for corporate finance and investment topics in Germany. It provides magazine, Website, newsletter, and event services to owners and managers of medium-sized companies. The company publishes approximately 90 journal issues; and operates 9 Web platforms in connection with online newsletters and social media presence. It also organizes events; and offers print, online event, and network services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Munich, Germany.

G6P.F.summary: Going Public Media Aktiengesellschaft operates as a media house for corporate finance and investment topics in Germany. It provides magazine, Website, newsletter, and event services to owners and managers of medium-sized companies. The company publishes approximately 90 journal issues; and operates 9 Web platforms in connection with online newsletters and social media presence. It also organizes events; and offers print, online event, and network services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Munich, Germany.

MF8.HM.summary: Cash.Medien AG, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a media company in Germany. It publishes Cash., an investment magazine that offers information regarding life insurance, investment funds, real estate, and property investments and related topics to financial services providers and private investors. The company also operates cash-online.de, an Internet portal of the magazine that provides up-to-date information on investment and financial advisory topics; Cash.Onvista, a free email service newsletter; and Cash.TV that produces product presentations and company portraits for the investment industry. In addition, it evaluates investment offers on the capital market mainly focusing on real assets. Cash.Medien AG is based in Hamburg, Germany.

SBV.SG.summary: Schwabenverlag AG operates as a publishing and printing company in Germany. The company publishes a range of books, illustrated books, magazines, art prints, and calendars; and provides services, including design and layout, and set-up and reproduction to the finished print product. Schwabenverlag AG was founded in 1848 and is based in Ostfildern, Germany.
